TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PushButtonState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the visual state of a button that is drawn with visual styles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The PushButtonState values correspond to the states of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> objects exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Button.PushButton> class. The PushButtonState values are also used as an argument in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer.DrawButton%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PushButtonState Default = int32(5)

Docs.summary: The button has the default appearance.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PushButtonState Disabled = int32(4)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PushButtonState Hot = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PushButtonState Normal = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The button has the normal appearance.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PushButtonState Pressed = int32(3)
